name: Untitled Jet Ski Game
description:
A simple jet ski game created over 3 days for https://itch.io/jam/stop-waiting-for-godot. Voice over sounds attributed to https://www.kenney.nl/, level select screen music by 3xBlast, level theme by Freemusicbyjames, and the rest of the assets made by myself.

Browser version tested to work, but executable versions recommended for controller support.

Keyboard Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move, R to restart the level

Gamepad Controls:

R2 to accelerate, L2 to break, Left stick to turn. Select restarts the level.
